title: Minimal Methane Emissions from Buildings
description: In 2019, Saint Kitts and Nevis recorded a methane emission from buildings of just 0.0001 Mt CO2e, one of the lowest globally.

title: Negligible F-gases Emissions from Industry
description: As of 2023, the country reported F-gases emissions from industrial processes at a mere 0.0001 Mt CO2e, showcasing its minimal industrial pollution footprint.

title: Low Education Expenditure
description: In 2021, Saint Kitts and Nevis allocated $13,736,000.66 to education, indicating a relatively low investment in educational development.

title: Minimal Child Mortality Rates
description: The country reported only one death in the age groups 5-9 and 10-14 in 2021 and 2023, respectively, highlighting its effective child healthcare systems.
